Rat Trap like Straight Shot, found himself pouring his little heart out for=
 Rodimus and Tucson to overcome the enemy that plagued the Primes.  So much=
 so that he found himself tearing a bit from both eyes.  Straight Shot was =
also showing tears in her eyes, as she holds Rat Trap's hand in support.  S=
he could also see that Silverbolt was also pouring his heart out for Tucson=
 and Rodimus to pull through, and with her free hand, she gently puts it in=
to Silverbolts.

" If there's one thing Tucson Prime told us that I'll reme=
mber always, is the fact that we have something that no Predacon or Decepti=
con, or Unicronian will ever possess.  A power so simple yet so powerful th=
at only those with pure hearts possess it.  You're feeling it too, you have=
 that power, we all do.  We just gotta tap into it, and let it be felt by T=
ucson and Rodimus Prime.  If they can feel that we're pulling for them, the=
y'll find the strength to make it."

Rat Trap smiles back to them.

"She's =
right Silverbolt, we can do this, we got what it takes, it's in our hearts,=
 and no one can take that away from us, no one.  But if Wheels'n Speedy are=
 gonna make it, we gotta show them that our hearts are pulln' for them all =
the way.  See?  Every time we put our hearts inta them, that light pulsing =
in Wheels, it gets brighter'n brighter. He knows  guys, he knows we're pull=
n' for 'em."

Night Shift nodds.

" Oh yeah, I'm just noticing that now.  H=
e knows we're pulln' for 'em all right, he can feel our energy commn' taget=
her.  We might not know that we're radiatn' somethn' out at 'em, but he sur=
e does."

With every hope poured into Tucson's success in recovering Rodimu=
s, his chest glows brighter and brighter with each pulsation.  It's as if h=
e could actually channel the energy put out by his comrades in a spiritual =
sense of being.  And on the table, even in slumber he lets them know just h=
ow he feels about their support.  He wispers.

" I - will - not fail you."
=

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston Carroll <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
=
>
> Silverbolt stood and watched as Nightshift, Elita and the others
> pour=
ed out thier hearts out over Rodimus. He turned and looked at
> Rodimus and=
 Tuscon through the glass, his hands behind his back. He
> felt rather than=
 saw Torca and Bantor come to stand behind him, all of
> them watching the =
struggle that was going on, on the others side.
> 
> They watched as Santon=
, Bump and Legacy, perhaps the best technicians
> that they had available w=
orked on Rodimus, thier movements swift and
> efficient. Silverbolt did not=
 normally go in for the whole spiritual
> side of things, but he could not =
help but to clench his fists and hope
> with ever fibre of his being that R=
odimus would pull through.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
